properties.description: Login name of the user

properties.description: Comma-separated list of roles to assign to the user. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.description: ID of the user to update

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: Full name of the user

options.description: Full name of the user

options.name: roles
options.description: Comma-separated list of roles to assign to the user. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Retrieve a fired alerts report

options.name: Get Report
options.description: Retrieve a fired alerts report

properties.name: searchConfigurationId
properties.description: ID of the search configuration to delete

properties.name: searchConfigurationId
properties.description: ID of the search configuration to retrieve

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to include a boolean value for each saved search to show whether the search is orphaned, meaning that it has no valid owner

options.name: add_orphan_field
options.description: Whether to include a boolean value for each saved search to show whether the search is orphaned, meaning that it has no valid owner

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Delete a search configuration

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a search configuration

options.name: Get
options.description: Retrieve a search configuration

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve many search configurations

properties.name: search
properties.description: Search language string to execute, in Splunk's Search Processing Language

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Seconds after which the search job automatically cancels

options.name: auto_cancel
options.description: Seconds after which the search job automatically cancels

options.name: auto_finalize_ec
options.description: Auto-finalize the search after at least this many events are processed

options.name: auto_pause
options.description: Seconds of inactivity after which the search job automatically pauses

options.name: index_earliest
options.description: The earliest index time for the search (inclusive)

options.name: earliest_time
options.description: The earliest cut-off for the search (inclusive)

options.name: indexedRealtimeOffset
options.description: Seconds of disk sync delay for indexed real-time search

options.name: index_latest
options.description: The latest index time for the search (inclusive)

options.name: latest_time
options.description: The latest cut-off for the search (inclusive)

options.name: max_time
options.description: Number of seconds to run this search before finalizing. Enter 0 to never finalize.

options.name: namespace
options.description: Application namespace in which to restrict searches

options.name: reduce_freq
options.description: How frequently to run the MapReduce reduce phase on accumulated map values

options.name: remote_server_list
options.description: Comma-separated list of (possibly wildcarded) servers from which raw events should be pulled. This same server list is to be used in subsearches.

options.name: reuse_max_seconds_ago
options.description: Number of seconds ago to check when an identical search is started and return the job’s search ID instead of starting a new job

options.name: rf
options.description: Name of a required field to add to the search. Even if not referenced or used directly by the search, a required field is still included in events and summary endpoints.

options.name: status_buckets
options.description: The most status buckets to generate. Set 0 generate no timeline information.

options.name: timeout
options.description: Number of seconds to keep this search after processing has stopped

options.name: workload_pool
options.description: New workload pool where the existing running search should be placed

properties.name: searchJobId
properties.description: ID of the search job to delete

properties.name: searchJobId
properties.description: ID of the search job to retrieve

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: options
properties.description: Key name to use for sorting

options.name: sort_key
options.description: Key name to use for sorting

options.name: sort_mode
options.description: If all field values are numeric, collate numerically. Otherwise, collate alphabetically.

options.name: Automatic
options.description: If all field values are numeric, collate numerically. Otherwise, collate alphabetically.

options.name: Alphabetic
options.description: Collate alphabetically, case-insensitive

options.name: Alphabetic and Case-Sensitive
options.description: Collate alphabetically, case-sensitive

options.name: Numeric
options.description: Collate numerically

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a search job

options.description: Create a search job

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a search job

options.name: Get
options.description: Retrieve a search job

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve many search jobs

properties.name: searchJobId
properties.description: ID of the search whose results to retrieve

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Key-value pair to match against. Example: if "Key" is set to user and "Field" is set to john, only the results where user is john will be returned.

options.name: keyValueMatch
options.description: Key-value pair to match against. Example: if "Key" is set to user and "Field" is set to john, only the results where user is john will be returned.

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to include field summary statistics in the response

options.name: add_summary_to_metadata
options.description: Whether to include field summary statistics in the response

subProperties.description: Number of seconds to run this search before finalizing. Enter 0 to never finalize.

subProperties.description: How frequently to run the MapReduce reduce phase on accumulated map values

subProperties.name: remote_server_list
subProperties.description: Comma-separated list of (possibly wildcarded) servers from which raw events should be pulled. This same server list is to be used in subsearches.

subProperties.name: reuse_max_seconds_ago
subProperties.description: Number of seconds ago to check when an identical search is started and return the job’s search ID instead of starting a new job

subProperties.name: rf
subProperties.description: Name of a required field to add to the search. Even if not referenced or used directly by the search, a required field is still included in events and summary endpoints.

notices.name: oldVersionNotice
notices.text: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
